alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Grand Isle; Lamoille; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:07PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lamoille, southeastern Grand Isle, northern Chittenden and central Franklin Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 306 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St. Albans City, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Enosburg Falls, Johnson Village, Cambridge, Bakersfield, Cambridge Village, Westford, Jeffersonville Village, St. Albans City, Fairfax, Sheldon, Georgia, Enosburg, Waterville, St. Albans Town, Johnson, Enosburg Falls Village, Georgia Center, Fletcher, Fairfield and Milton. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 97 and 119. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Grand Isle; Lamoille; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin
